name: Mountain Bike
description: Road bicycle racing is the cycle sport discipline of road cycling, held on paved roads. Stage races or tours take multiple days, and consist of several mass-start or time-trial stages ridden consecutively. Professional racing originated in Western Europe, centred in France, Spain, Italy and the Low Countries.
